name: Source reliability (binary)
description: Determines validity of source (website) at a binary scale with two options: reliable source and unreliable source.

name: Fact-checking article to claim mapping
description: Determines mapping between fact-checking article and claim.

name: Claim presence
description: Determines presence of claim in article.

name: Claim stance
description: Determines stance of an article to a claim.

name: Sentence embedding
description: Contains precalculated sentence embeddings of related object (i.e. article).

name: Article veracity
description: Aggregated information about veracity from article-claim pairs.
